Songa

Korean: 송아

Country:

South Korea

Full name:
Kim Ho-Yeon

Group (2015):

Group (2006-2008):
Kirots

Introduction

Songa, formerly known as Hoyeon, is a South Korean former singer. She is a former member of the girl group Kirots and was a pre-debut member of the girl group UNIZ.
